phrs.translation: 粘质泥灰岩, 粘土泥灰岩, 黏土泥灰岩, 翻译
灰质泥灰岩, 钙质泥灰岩, 石灰岩
泥灰土, 泥灰质土壤
白云石质泥灰岩, 白云泥灰岩, 白雪泥灰岩
斑点花式纱, 夹色纱线
易劈泥灰岩, 泥灰板岩, 泥灰板岩层

sentences.sentence: Satan has roused himself from off the burning marl, and he stands in order to call up his fallen minions.
sentences.translation: 撒旦从燃烧的泥灰中苏醒过来，站起来召唤着他同样堕落了的随从们。

sentences.sentence: I will lay the foundation of the roof with the marl.
sentences.translation: 我要用这些泥灰苫背屋顶。

sentences.sentence: The Shiqianfeng Formation is subdivided into three members, namely, Pingdingshan sandstone, Lamellibranchiate marl and gypsum lime-nodule.
sentences.translation: 石千峰组又分为三段：平顶山砂岩段、瓣鳃泥灰岩段及石膏钙核段。
